General.Name: Jiangsu Boxin Investing & Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Boxin Investing&Holdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the equipment leasing business in China. It offers equipment leasing, including shield machines, gantry cranes, tower cranes, crawler cranes, rotary drilling drills, hydraulic piling hammers, and other mechanical equipment. The company also provides smart hardware and related products, comprising smart sweeping robots, air purifiers, bladeless fans, and smartphones. In addition, it engages in the trading of construction materials. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
